How To Stop Hydroplaning.0:
1. Ease your foot off the gas or brake pedal.
2. Steer the car in the direction you want it to go.
3. Hold the steering wheel firmly and smoothly steer in the desired direction.

How To Make Chocolate Milk from Cocoa.0:
1. Measure 2 tbsp of sugar and 2 tbsp of cocoa powder into a saucepan.
2. Add enough milk to the saucepan to create a thick, lumpy paste and stir.
3. Simmer the mixture on low heat, stirring constantly, until the lumps are gone.
4. Pour the cocoa mixture into a glass.
5. Fill the glass with milk, stirring constantly, to achieve a strong chocolate flavor.

How To Clean a Washing Machine with Vine.0:
1. Run the washing machine on the hottest and longest setting.
2. Pour 4 cups of white vinegar into the washer as it fills with water.
3. Add 1 cup of baking soda to the washer for a deeper cleaning.
4. Close the lid and let the machine run for 5 minutes.
5. Stop the machine and let it sit for an hour.
6. Turn the machine back on and let it finish its cycle.

How To Clean a Bunn Coffee Pot.0:
1. Soak the Bunn coffee pot in hot, soapy water for 20-30 minutes.
2. Wash the coffee pot with a soft cloth and soapy water.
How To Clean a Bunn Coffee Pot.1:
1. Place the coffee pot upside-down on the top rack of the dishwasher.
2. Wash the coffee pot in the dishwasher.
How To Clean a Bunn Coffee Pot.2:
1. Fill the coffee pot with vinegar and soak for 3-4 hours.
2. Rinse the coffee pot with warm water.
3. Wash the coffee pot with warm, soapy water.
How To Clean a Bunn Coffee Pot.3:
1. Slide the brew funnel out of the machine.
2. Scrub the brew funnel with warm, soapy water.
How To Clean a Bunn Coffee Pot.4: 1. Wash the brew funnel in the washing machine

How To Make Lemon or Lime Water.0:
1. Slice 2 lemons thinly.
2. Squeeze the slices gently into the pitcher and add them to it.
3. Pour water into the pitcher.
4. Scoop out the lemons and serve.

How To Make Keto Pancakes.0:
1. Combine almond flour, coconut flour, confectioners' erythritol sweetener, baking powder, and kosher salt in a large mixing bowl.
2. Whisk the dry ingredients together.
3. Combine unsweetened coconut milk, heavy cream, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, and eggs in a separate bowl.
4. Whisk the wet ingredients until they’re thoroughly combined.
5. Pour the wet ingredients into the bowl with the dry ingredients.
6. Add coconut flakes, chopped macadamia nuts, and lemon zest to the batter.
7. Mix the batter together with a whisk or spatula.
8. Butter a non-stick pan.
9. Spread a small amount of batter in the bottom of the pan.
10. Cook the pancake over medium heat for about 3 minutes, until the first side is golden brown.
11. Flip the pancake over and cook for another 2 minutes.
12. Transfer the pancake to a plate.

How To Make Frozen Yogurt.0:
1. Combine the seeds from a vanilla bean with ½ cup (115 g) of sugar.
2. Whisk together whole-milk yogurt, fat-free Greek yogurt, and honey in a separate bowl.
3. Combine the vanilla-sugar mixture with the yogurt mixture.
4. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker.
5. Freeze the yogurt until it’s solid.
How To Make Frozen Yogurt.1:
1. Combine pureed strawberries, lemon juice, and sugar.
2. Add Greek yogurt to the strawberry mixture.
3. Chill the mixture for 3-4 hours.
4. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker.
5. Add diced strawberries 15 minutes into the process.
6. Freeze the yogurt until it’s solid.

How To Make Chili Sauce.0:
1. Mix 5 chopped tomatoes, 2 chopped onions, 3 chopped jalapeños, brown sugar, vinegar, salt, and red chili flakes in a pot.
2. Heat the mixture on the stove over medium-high heat until it starts to boil.
3. Lower the heat and let the chili simmer for 20 minutes.
4. Turn off the heat and let the chili cool down before serving.

How To Play Congkak.0:
1. Scoop up all the seeds in any one of your houses.
2. Drop a seed into every house in a clockwise direction.
How To Play Congkak.1:
1. Scoop up all the seeds in the house with the most seeds.
2. Drop a seed into every house in a clockwise direction, including your storehouse.

How To Clean Wood Blinds.0:
1. Position the blinds so that the slats are almost all the way closed.
2. Wipe down each slat from left to right with a damp cotton rag, starting at the top and working down, scrubbing stains in a circular motion.
3. Dry each slat individually with a dry rag.
4. Angle the blinds the other way using the adjusting rod.
5. Wipe down each slat from left to right with a damp cotton rag, starting at the top and working down, scrubbing stains in a circular motion.
6. Dry each slat individually with a dry rag.

How To Address a Business Letter.0:
1. Write your full name in the top-left corner of the page.
2. Write your address underneath your name.
3. Write the date underneath your address.
4. Write the recipient's full name and title, leaving 2 lines after the date.
5. Write the recipient's job title and the full name of their business underneath their name.
6. Write the recipient's address on the next line.
7. Leave 2 lines before starting the letter.

How To Make Your Sims's Need Full.0:
1. Type "Testingcheats on" and press Enter to enable cheats.
2. Type "fillmotive motive_Hunger" into the cheat console.
How To Make Your Sims's Need Full.1:
1. Type "Testingcheats on" and press Enter to enable cheats.
2. Hold down Shift and click on a Sim.
3. Select "Cheat needs" from the pop-up menu.
4. Click on "Make happy" to fill up all of the Sim's needs.

How To Put a Collar on a Kitten.0:
1. Place the breakaway or quick-release collar on the floor.
2. Allow the kitten to sniff and inspect the collar.
3. Place the collar around the kitten's neck and secure it with the clasp.
4. Slip 2 fingers under the collar to test its tightness and adjust as necessary.

How To Make 3D Pictures.0:
1. Cut out each layer in the copied photos, leaving one of the photos untouched.
2. Attach adhesive foam pieces to the back of each cut-out layer.
3. Stack the cut-out layers on the untouched photo so the layers are popping out in 3D.

How To Make a Hot Dog in the Microwave.0:
1. Place the hot dog on a microwave-safe plate lined with a paper towel.
2. Pierce the hot dog with a fork a few times.
3. Cover the hot dog with another paper towel.
4. Microwave the hot dog on high heat for 40 seconds.

How To Date a Girl in Grand Theft Auto:.0:
1. Wear expensive garments.
2. Drive a nice car.
3. Get tattoos.
How To Date a Girl in Grand Theft Auto:.1:
1. Build muscle to reach 15-20 percent.
2. Reduce body fat to less than 5 percent by not eating for several days.
3. Wear expensive garments.
4. Drive a nice car.
5. Get tattoos.

How To Figure out if Two Lines Are Paral.0:
1. Calculate the slope of the first line using the formula (Y2 - Y1) / (X2 - X1).
2. Calculate the slope of the second line using the formula (Y2 - Y1) / (X2 - X1).
3. Determine the lines are parallel since the slopes are equal.

How To Cook Enoki Mushrooms.0:
1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds, stirring continuously.
3. Add the Enoki mushrooms, soy sauce, and sesame oil, and stir-fry for 4 minutes.
4. Remove the pan from the heat and let it sit for 3 minutes before serving.

How To Make a Gin Martini.0:
1. Add ice cubes and vermouth to a cocktail shaker and swirl them around to coat the cubes.
2. Pour gin into the cocktail shaker.
3. Stir the mixture for 60 seconds.
4. Strain the mixture into a serving glass.
5. Garnish with an olive.

How To Read Roman Numerals.0:
1. Identify the order of the numerals in the Roman numeral.
2. Add the numerals together to get the number.
3. Subtract the smaller numeral from the larger one that comes after it.
How To Read Roman Numerals.1:
1. Identify a numeral with a line over it and multiply it by 1,000 to find its value.
2. Add the remaining numerals according to their order.
How To Read Roman Numerals.2:
1. Identify the order of the numerals in the Roman numeral.
2. Add the numerals according to their order, ignoring any subtractive notation and considering a line over any numeral as an indication of multiplication by 1000.

How To Remove Wax from Clothing.0:
1. Let the wax dry completely on the clothing.
2. Scrape off any excess wax with a dull knife or a credit card.
3. Place paper towels over the remaining wax.
4. Run a low-heat iron over the stained area to transfer the wax to the paper towels.
5. Spray the area with stain remover.
6. Wash the clothing in the hottest water possible.

How To Make a Cookie Bouquet.0:
1. Roll out the cookie dough and cut out the desired shapes using cookie cutters.
2. Insert a lollipop stick or wooden skewer into each cookie.
3. Bake the cookies on a baking sheet.
4. Decorate the cookies with a glaze and let them fully dry.
5. Arrange the cookies in the container by sticking the skewers into the florist's foam.

How To Eat Bagels.0:
1. Slice the bagel in half.
2. Toast the bagel halves in a pop-up toaster.
3. Add butter, cream cheese, and smoked salmon.
How To Eat Bagels.1:
1. Warm the bagel in a 375°F oven for 5 minutes.
2. Slice the warmed bagel in half.
3. Add butter, cream cheese, and smoked salmon as toppings.
How To Eat Bagels.2:
1. Slice the bagel in half.
2. Layer cream cheese between the bagel halves.
3. Add smoked salmon on top of the cream cheese.
4. Add thinly sliced red onion on top of the smoked salmon.
5. Add capers on top of the red onion.

How To Write a Contract Addendum.0:
1. Write a title for the addendum that connects it to the original contract.
2. Specify the parties involved and the effective date of the addendum.
3. List each part of the original contract being modified.
4. Write out the specific addition, deletion, or modification being made.
5. Create signature and notary blocks with spaces for names and dates.

How To Catch Rabbits.0:
1. Place an open-mesh live animal trap near the rabbit trails.
2. Add bait such as carrots, corn on the cob, clover, bananas, or alfalfa to the trap.
3. Add water to the trap.
4. Check the trap until the rabbit is caught.
5. Relocate the rabbit.

How To Open the Hood of a Vehicle.0:
1. Pull the interior release latch near the steering wheel.
2. Open the hood with the exterior latch.
How To Open the Hood of a Vehicle.1:
1. Locate the hood release lever under the dashboard.
2. Pull the hood release lever to release the hood catch.
3. Move to the front of the vehicle and find the secondary hood release latch.
4. Trip the latch with a screwdriver.
5. Open the hood.
How To Open the Hood of a Vehicle.2:
1. Locate the hood release lever, usually found under the dashboard or steering column.
2. Pull the hood release lever to release the hood catch.
3. Move to the front of the vehicle and find the secondary release mechanism, usually a latch or clip.
4. Release the secondary mechanism by sliding the latch or pressing the clip.
5. Open the hood of the vehicle.

How To Remove Emblems From Cars.0:
1. Pour hot water over the emblem to soften the glue.
2. Slide a plastic wedge between the car body and the emblem.
3. Pry the emblem off from multiple angles.
How To Remove Emblems From Cars.1:
1. Spray the emblem with adhesive remover.
2. Slide a plastic wedge between the car body and the emblem.
3. Pry the emblem off from multiple angles.
How To Remove Emblems From Cars.2:
1. Warm the emblem with a hair dryer.
2. Slide a plastic wedge between the car body and the emblem.
3. Pry the emblem off from multiple angles.
How To Remove Emblems From Cars.3:
1. Pour hot water over the emblem to soften the glue.
2. Slide a piece of dental floss behind the emblem.
3. Cut through the adhesive attaching the emblem to the car.
How To Remove Emblems From Cars.4:
1. Spray the emblem with adhesive remover.
2. Slide a piece of dental floss or fishing line behind the emblem.
3. Cut through the adhesive attaching the emblem to the car.
How To Remove Emblems From Cars.5:
1. Warm the emblem with a hair dryer.
2. Slide a piece of dental floss behind the emblem.
3. Cut through the adhesive attaching the emblem to the car.

How To Mix Cement.0:
1. Combine 1 part cement, 2 parts sand, and 4 parts gravel in a large bucket or wheelbarrow.
2. Make a small crater in the mixture and add half a bucket of water.
3. Mix the cement with a shovel and add more water until it forms a smooth paste.

How To Make a Pillow Fort.0:
1. Move 4 chairs up against a wall, facing each other, with enough space in between for sitting and lying down.
2. Drape 2 large sheets or blankets over the chairs to cover them completely.
3. Place 6 pillows against the wall inside the fort for comfort.
4. Use 8 additional pillows to create the walls of the fort by leaning them against the chairs.

How To Clean Athletic Shoes.0:
1. Scrub off chunks of dirt or grime from the shoes using a dry toothbrush.
2. Remove the laces and insoles from the shoes.
3. Dampen a sponge or soft towel in soapy water and scrub stained areas of the shoes, avoiding leather or foam parts.
4. Wipe the shoes down with a damp cloth to rinse off any remaining soap.
5. Allow the shoes to air dry.
6. Replace the insoles and laces.

How To Cook Frozen Peas.0:
1. Bring 3-4 cups of water to a rolling boil in a medium saucepan.
2. Pour the frozen peas into the boiling water and stir them gently.
3. Boil the peas, uncovered, for 3 minutes.
4. Drain the water from the peas.
5. Season the peas with butter, salt, and pepper.

How To Cross Stitch.0:
1. Thread a single thread of embroidery floss through the needle.
2. Begin the cross stitch in the centermost block by pushing the needle through the back of the fabric.
3. Continue cross stitching with 1 “x” per grid block on the pattern.
4. Tie off the thread.
5. Cut the thread.

How To Catch a Fox.0:
1. Bait the trap with chicken.
2. Set the trap near the area where the fox has been spotted.
3. Leave the trap overnight.
How To Catch a Fox.1:
1. Dig a deep, steep-sided hole near a tree or stump.
2. Place bait at the bottom of the hole.
3. Cover the top of the hole with branches and leaves.
4. Wait for the fox to fall into the hole.
5. Remove the fox from the hole.
How To Catch a Fox.2:
1. Place bait near the live trap.
2. Gradually move the bait closer to the trap.
3. Bait the trap.

How To Get a Philippine Passport.0:
1. Bring original documents, IDs, and 2 copies of each to the appointment.
2. Pay the required fee of P950.00.

How To Dry Up Poison Ivy Rash.0:
1. Wash the skin with warm soapy water.
2. Dry off thoroughly.
3. Soak a clean towel in cold water, ring it out, and apply it to the rash.
How To Dry Up Poison Ivy Rash.1:
1. Mix baking soda with a little bit of water to create a paste.
2. Apply the baking soda paste to the blisters.

How To Make Sweet and Sour Pork.0:
1. Fry the pieces of pork in a skillet until they're golden brown.
2. Drain the pineapples, reserving the juice.
3. Combine the pineapple juice, water, vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, and salt to make the sauce.
4. Pour the sauce over the pork.
5. Mix cornstarch with water to form a paste and add it to the pot.
6. Continue cooking until the sauce thickens and bubbles.

How To Make a Plastic Bottle Wormery.0:
1. Cut off the top of the plastic bottle.
2. Add 2 cups of sand to the bottom of the bottle and moisten it with water.
3. Add 2 cups of moistened garden soil to the bottle.
4. Add another 2 cups of moistened sand to the bottle.
5. Add 5 worms to the wormery.

How To Make Ribbon Flowers.0:
1. Weave a needle and thread through the top third of the ribbon.
2. Pull the thread through the ribbon to create a blossoming effect.
3. Tie the thread in a double knot to hold the blossom in place.
4. Glue the two ends of the ribbon together.
5. Place a button at the center of the flower to cover the glue.

How To Make Mobiles.0:
1. Sketch a combination of simple, roughly symmetrical shapes.
2. Draw or trace the shapes onto cardstock and cut them out.
3. Arrange the shapes in a vertical line on a flat surface.
4. Cut a piece of string or fishing line long enough to reach from the bottom shape to a few feet past the top.
5. Secure the string to each shape using glue, keeping the shapes centered.
6. Attach a penny to the bottom shape to weigh down the mobile.

How To Reheat Mashed Potatoes.0:
1. Stir cream into the mashed potatoes to rehydrate them.
2. Microwave the potatoes at half power for a few minutes.
3. Microwave for a few more minutes until warm.
How To Reheat Mashed Potatoes.1:
1. Bring cream to a simmer in a pan on the stove.
2. Stir the mashed potatoes into the simmered cream.
3. Continue stirring until the potatoes are heated through.
How To Reheat Mashed Potatoes.2:
1. Stir cream into the mashed potatoes to rehydrate them.
2. Place the potatoes in a 350°F oven.
3. Heat the potatoes in the oven for 30 minutes.

How To Make Coffee Jelly.0:
1. Combine hot water and gelatin in a bowl until the granules dissolve.
2. Heat the dissolved gelatin in a saucepan with coffee and sugar until it comes to a boil.
3. Pour the mixture into serving dishes.
4. Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for 4 hours to let it set.
5. Serve the jelly with a dollop of whipped cream.
How To Make Coffee Jelly.1:
1. Combine hot water and gelatin in a bowl until the granules dissolve.
2. Heat the dissolved gelatin in a saucepan with coffee and sugar until it comes to a boil.
3. Pour the mixture into a lightly greased pan.
4. Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for 6 hours.
5. Cut the jelly into cubes.

How To Mix Paint to Make the Colour Pink.0:
1. Choose the cadmium shade of red.
2. Gradually add the cadmium red paint to the white, stirring until you get the desired shade of pink.
How To Mix Paint to Make the Colour Pink.1:
1. Gradually add the red paint to the white, stirring until you get the desired shade of pink.
2. Add a little green paint to the mixture to tone down the pink.

How To Freeze Pizza.0:
1. Wrap each cooked pizza slice individually in plastic wrap.
2. Wrap the plastic-wrapped slices in aluminum foil.
3. Place the wrapped slices in a plastic bag.
4. Store the bag in the freezer.
How To Freeze Pizza.1:
1. Dust the raw pizza dough with flour on all sides.
2. Place the floured dough in a freezer-safe container or wrap it in plastic wrap.
3. Store the container or wrapped dough in the freezer.

How To Get Bug Bites to Stop Itching.0: 1. Apply ice to the bug bite to numb it.
How To Get Bug Bites to Stop Itching.1: 1. Heat the bug bite with a blow dryer.

How To Make Wheat Paste.0:
1. Whisk 3 tablespoons of flour with room temperature water until the mixture is runny enough to pour.
2. Pour the flour mixture into boiling water, stirring continuously.
3. Continue stirring until the mixture is thick and smooth.
4. Remove the mixture from the heat and let it cool.

How To Prune Tomatoes.0:
1. Remove any flowers from the plant until it’s between 12 and 18 inches (30 and 45 cm) tall.
2. Pinch off any suckers that grow beneath the first flower cluster on the plant.
3. Use clean pruning shears to snip off the suckers.

How To Melt Butter.0:
1. Cut the butter into small pieces.
2. Place the butter pieces in a microwave-safe bowl covered with a paper towel.
3. Microwave the butter for 10 seconds.
4. Stir the butter.
5. Microwave the butter for 10 seconds.
6. Stir the butter.
7. Microwave the butter for 10 seconds.
8. Stir the butter.
How To Melt Butter.1:
1. Cut the butter into small pieces.
2. Heat the butter pieces on the stovetop over low heat until nearly melted.
3. Turn off the heat and stir the butter until fully melted.

How To Cook Ribs.0:
1. Remove the membrane and trim the fat from the ribs with a knife.
2. Season the ribs with 1/4 teaspoon of salt per pound of meat and apply a spice rub.
3. Place the ribs on a wire rack in a foil-lined tray.
4. Broil the ribs for 10 minutes.
5. Roast the ribs in the oven at 300 °F for 2 hours.
6. Brush the ribs with barbecue sauce 30 minutes before they're done.

How To Draw a Kangaroo.0:
1. Draw a curved “L” shape.
2. Add a smaller, curved line at the top of the “L” shape.
3. Draw a long, curved line from the outer point of the top line to the inner point of the "L" shape to create the body.
4. Modify the bottom line of the “L” into the back legs.
5. Sketch in the front legs above the back legs.
6. Add a large tail and ears to the body.
7. Draw a dot in the center of the face for an eye.
8. Draw a curved line underneath the eye for the mouth.

How To Make a Kite.0:
1. Lay the longer dowel down on a flat surface and place the shorter dowel on top of it about 4 inches (12.5 cm) above the midpoint, perpendicularly.
2. Wrap string around the point where the 2 dowels meet, and use hot glue to cover the string and seal the 2 dowels together.
3. Cut a notch in the end of each dowel.
4. Run a long length of string around the ends of the dowels to connect the 4 ends, using the notches to keep the string in place.
5. Pull the string tight and tie the 2 ends into a knot.
6. Cut off the excess string.
7. Lay the frame on top of a sheet of thin plastic, and outline the frame with a marker.
8. Cut around the outline, adding 2 inches (5 cm) to each side.
9. Lay the frame on top of the sheet and line the inside of each dowel with hot glue.
10. Fold the excess plastic over the dowel and press it into the hot glue.
11. Tie a piece of string to the end of one of the dowels and run the other end to the opposite end of the dowel, tying it there.
12. Tie a second piece of string to the end of the other dowel and run the other end to the opposite end of the dowel, tying it there.
13. Tie the 2 lengths of string to a third piece of string at the junction where the 2 strings meet to make the bridle and line.

How To Address the President.0: 1. Address the President as "Mr. President" or "Madam President" when speaking in person.
How To Address the President.1: 1. Begin the letter with "Dear Mr. President"

How To Prune a Fig Tree.0: 1. Trim away about half of the fig tree after its first winter outside.
How To Prune a Fig Tree.1:
1. Cut away any small branches growing from the base or roots of the tree.
2. Remove any dead growth from the tree.
3. Remove new branches that grow from wood but don’t provide fruit.

How To Sort Laundry.0:
1. Separate laundry items by color.
2. Separate heavier items from lighter items.
How To Sort Laundry.1:
1. Separate laundry items by color.
2. Separate heavily soiled items from other items.
3. Separate lint-producing items from other items.
4. Separate heavier items from lighter items.

How To Cook Octopus.0:
1. Cut the tentacles off the octopus body using a sharp knife.
2. Cut the head off the middle piece of the octopus and discard the middle piece.
3. Bring a large pot of water, vegetables, and herbs to a boil.
4. Add the tentacles and head to the boiling pot.
5. Cook the octopus, covered, for 45 minutes.
6. Strain the cooked octopus and serve with rice.

How To Make Cocktail Sauce.0:
1. Combine 3/4 cup of tomato sauce, 2 tablespoons of lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon of Worcestershire sauce in a bowl.
2. Grate 1/2 cup of fresh horseradish and add it to the bowl.
3. Add 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper to the bowl.
4. Mix the ingredients well.
How To Make Cocktail Sauce.1:
1. Stir together 1/2 cup of mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon of tomato sauce, and a pinch of salt.
2. Pour in 1 teaspoon of freshly squeezed lemon juice.
How To Make Cocktail Sauce.2: 1. Add a touch of hot sauce to the cocktail sauce.

How To Calculate Price Earnings Ratio.0: 1. Divide the market price per share by the earnings per share to get the price-earnings ratio.
How To Calculate Price Earnings Ratio.1:
1. Subtract dividends on preferred stock from the net income.
2. Divide the result by the average outstanding shares of common stock to find the earnings per share.
3. Divide the market price by the earnings per share to get the price-earnings ratio.

How To Make Pizza Without an Oven at Hom.0:
1. Heat 1 teaspoon of cooking oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
2. Roll out the pizza dough into a circle slightly smaller than the skillet.
3. Place the dough in the skillet and cook for about a minute.
4. Flip the crust and top it with pizza sauce, shredded cheese, and desired toppings.
5. Cover the pan with a lid, turn the heat down, and cook for 5 minutes.

How To Make Potato Skins.0:
1. Cut baking potatoes in half and score the insides with a fork.
2. Microwave the potatoes for 10 minutes until they're soft.
3. Scrape the inside of the potato into a bowl.
4. Add shredded cheddar cheese, green onions, and bacon bits to the bowl and mix thoroughly.
5. Scoop the mixture into the potato skins.
6. Bake the potato skins in the oven for 20 minutes at 350°F (177°C).

How To Make Henna.0: 1. Mix henna powder with lemon juice, sugar, and lavender essential oil to create a henna paste.
How To Make Henna.1:
1. Blend the dried leaves into a fine powder.
2. Mix the henna powder with lemon juice, sugar, and lavender essential oil to create a henna paste.

How To Make Chinese Pancakes (Bing).0:
1. Knead the dough until it is soft and not too wet.
2. Separate the dough into pieces of the desired size and shape them into flattened circles.
3. Sprinkle chopped scallions or spring onions onto each pancake and knead them in.
4. Fry the pancakes in a skillet over medium heat for 5 minutes on both sides, until they are golden brown.

How To Prepare for Baby Bunnies.0:
1. Line a nest box with 1 to 2 inches of cedar or pine shavings for padding.
2. Fill the rest of the nest box with straw to keep the bunnies warm.
3. Create a small burrow in the straw at the top of the box.
4. Place the nest box in the rabbit's cage.

3. Let the WD-40 soak for 10 minutes.
4. Wipe the surface clean with a towel.

2. Apply the cloth to the area affected by sap for 10 minutes.
3. Rub off the softened sap with a microfiber cloth.

How To Play Baseketball.0:
1. Mark multiple shooting spots within the diamond.
2. Choose a shooting square and make a shot.
3. Run the bases according to the chosen square.

How To Make a Detox Juice.0:
1. Mix 2 tablespoons of freshly squeezed lemon juice, 2 tablespoons of pure maple syrup, and 1/10 teaspoon of cayenne pepper with 8 ounces of water.
2. Divide the mixture into 6 servings.
3. Drink 1 serving of the mixture.

1. Combine 3 carrots, 2 celery stalks, ½ a cabbage, 2 beets, 1 turnip, ½ an onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 3 kale leaves, 1 cup of spinach, and ½ a bunch of parsley in a blender.
2. Add a sufficient amount of water to the blender and blend until the ingredients are fully liquefied.

How To Write a Blog Post.0:
1. Write a short, bold title for the blog post.
2. Introduce the topic by asking a fascinating question.
3. Separate the main body of the post into short, easy-to-follow paragraphs.
4. Add a call to action in the conclusion.

How To Clean a Fish Tank With Sand.0:
1. Turn off the heater, filter, and pumps.
2. Remove all plants and decorations from the tank.

How To Make a Butterfly Origami.0:

How To Fix a Garage Door Spring.0:

9. Wind the springs.
10. Tighten the screw sets around the springs.
11. Remove the clamp keeping the garage door closed.

How To Crochet a Ball.0:
1. Chain 2 stitches.
2. Work 6 single crochet stitches into the second chain from the hook to form the first round.
3. Work 2 single crochet stitches into each of the 6 stitches for the second round.
4. Insert 2 single crochet stitches into the first stitch, then 1 single crochet stitch into the next stitch, and repeat this pattern for the third round.
5. Work 1 single crochet stitch for rounds 4 through 6.
6. Work a single crochet decrease, then 1 single crochet stitch, and repeat this pattern for round 7.
7. Stuff the ball.
8. Decrease in rounds 8 and 9.
